instruction: Evaluate the number of independent directors with risk-management expertise in the bank under consideration.
output: As per the data presented in the exhibit, it can be seen that as of March 2023, approximately 39% of banks in the MSCI World Index did not have any independent directors with risk-management expertise. Therefore, it is crucial to evaluate if the bank under consideration has a sufficient number of independent directors with the right skills to help oversee its risk management and provide constructive challenges to senior executives.
